channel.title: Shops
channel.description: In spawn-config, there is only 3 shops. However in game there are over 10, where else would they be registered, eg (i want to change coordinates) [code]//new shops spawn = 659 2646 9906 0 1 1 1 1 party pete spawn = 7601 2353 3802 0 0 1 1 1 reggie spawn = 7967 2320 3811 0 1 1 1 1 pk store[/code]

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Check more than one file, they might be in shops.java or shophandler even

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Get their X and Y in the game and compare them to the spawn log to find them. That what I do.

Read full topic

item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Depends what source your using,but try and find something named like ‘shops.java’?

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“NumberEleven, post:1, topic:397776”]In spawn-config, there is only 3 shops. However in game there are over 10, where else would they be registered, eg (i want to change coordinates)

//new shops spawn = 659 2646 9906 0 1 1 1 1 party pete spawn = 7601 2353 3802 0 0 1 1 1 reggie spawn = 7967 2320 3811 0 1 1 1 1 pk store[/quote]

Second two numbers. First is Npc Id, next to are X and Y.

Read full topic
